channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dozens of parents rights groups call for 50 state audit to rid K-12 schools of DEI: 'Clean up the mess'
item.description: Parental rights groups demand nationwide K-12 education audits to eliminate DEI discrimination and improve teacher vetting across all 50 states and Wa...

item.title: With two new funds to trumpet, Sequoia’s Roelof Botha opens up about the state of the VC market—and about the firm’s controversial partner
item.description: The managing partner of Silicon Valley's storied VC firm had a lot of news to discuss in his appearance at a San Francisco startup conference.

item.title: Stefanik to release new book on college antisemitism as she eyes bid for NY governor
item.description: Rep. Elise Stefanik is out with a new book on her efforts to crack down on antisemitism ahead of an anticipated campaign for New York governor.

item.title: As New Dietary Guidelines Loom, It’s Time to Flip the Food Pyramid
item.description: South Park had it right.

item.title: Scoop: Combat veteran launches congressional run in bid to flip longtime Democrat-held seat red
item.description: Republican Jennifer-Ruth Green, a combat veteran, enters House race as GOP redistricting could shift northwest Indiana district from blue to red in 20...

item.title: Gen Zers are using AI to skip meetings, get promoted faster and win bigger salary hikes. But they don’t feel great about it

item.title: Netflix and Amazon Prime are using AI algorithms that hide content from some users, media executive says
item.description: “The larger problem comes in distribution and the use of algo when content is being shown,” Reliance Industries media president Jyoti Deshpande said.

item.title: AOC mocks Gaines for fifth-place finish at NCAA championships

item.title: Flight delays worsen as unpaid air traffic controllers feel government shutdown pain
item.description: Flights across the U.S. are facing growing delays as unpaid air traffic controllers feel the strain of the ongoing government shutdown.

item.title: Will Trump’s FTC Rein In Lina Khan’s Abuses?
item.description: The consumer welfare standard should once again guide the commission’s work.

item.title: We Need the Pro-Life Old Guard
item.description: The sidelining of pro-life intellectuals has contributed to Trump’s weakening pro-life position, including the new push for IVF.

item.title: Mamdani’s Islamophobia Canard
item.description: If this is what Islamophobia looks like, everyone should welcome having some sectarian hatred directed their way.

item.title: Milei’s Triumph
item.description: His party’s over-performance in Argentina’s midterm elections provides a boost to his free market reforms.

item.title: Pennsylvania Department Of Education Touts ‘Media Literacy’ For Kids While Pushing Left-Wing Sources
item.description: PDE's efforts to help kids navigate various sources is weakened by ideological taint, but it is doomed by a rejection of absolute truth.
